result.title: Великий код великих людей
result.content:
include <bits/stdc++.h>

define out(x) printf("%lld",x)

define in(x) scanf("%lld",&x)

define puts() printf("\n")

define F first

define S second

define mp make_pair

define pb push_back

define pf push_front

define pbp pop_back

define pfp pop_front

define fast ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0),cin.tie(0),cout.tie(0)

define all(x) x.begin(),x.end()

define rep(i,b,e) for(int i=b;i<=e;++i)

define per(i,b,e) for(int i=b;i>=e;--i)

define sz size()

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll; typedef unsigned long long ull; typedef long double ld; typedef string S;
typedef double D; typedef vector VI; typedef vector VS; typedef vector<pair<int,int> >PII; typedef map<int,int> MII;

const S ou = " "; const int N = 1e5 + 17; const int mod = 1e9 + 7; const int INF = 2e9 — 19;

ll MX=(ll)1e10,MN=(ll)-1e10; ll powmod(ll a,ll b) {ll res=1;a%=mod; assert(b>=0); for(;b;b>>=1){if(b&1)res=res*a%mod;a=a*a%mod;}return res;} ll gcd(ll a,ll b) { return b?gcd(b,a%b):a;} /////////////////////////////////// //Best code from Asanaly Serekbay// ///////////////////////////////////

int T,n,m,ans=1;

int main(){ #ifdef BloodCandy cout<<"Welcome my lord ^_^\n"; freopen("in.txt","r",stdin); freopen("out.txt","w",stdout); #endif

cin>>n>>m;

if(n==0&&m==0){cout<<1;return 0;}

else if(n==0||m==0){cout<<4;return 0;}

else if(n==m&&n==1){cout<<3;return 0;}

else if(n==m&&n==2){cout<<3;return 0;}

else if(n==m){cout<<5;return 0;}

else {

}

return 0; }
